description: Situated in a picturesque historic hamlet with a castle once inhabited by the Malatesta dynasty, this restaurant boasts a charming traditional dining room. The delicious cuisine is the star of the show here, featuring specialities from Romagna, including meat, fish and fresh pasta dishes, as well as tempting desserts. Not to be missed!
